txt.en: You have used a Forge-master for the first time, and there are sure to be many more visits in the future. Forge-masters can identify Legendary Items for you, and when they need to be re-forged, they can re-forge them for you.

You have used a Forge-master for the first time, and there are sure to be many more visits in the future. Forge-masters can reforge your legendary items for you as you level, increasing their base damage and the maximum level your traceries can achieve.\n\nYou can generally reforge your weapons every 5 levels, or as new content releases increase the average level of gear available in Middle-earth.
